MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the KY8 and KY15 postcode areas of Leven and Cupar. Our emergency response team have advised that in order to complete a repair on a broken piece of electrical equipment near Letham Caravan Site, we need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.45AM. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 5.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 9.06AM on 05 December 2020.
